remarks: Deduce a right angle from perpendicular lines.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Nov-2019.)
statement:
colperpex.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
colperpex.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
colperpex.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
colperpex.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
colperpex.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
perprag.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
perprag.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
perprag.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( A L B ) ) $.
perprag.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
perprag.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A L B ) ( perpG ` G ) ( C L D ) ) $.
perprag $p |- ( ph -> <" A C D "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
